basicInfo.parentCompany: Independent (privately held; founded by Peter Holden; bootstrapped)
basicInfo.notes: Founded in 2010 by Peter Holden in Tulsa, Oklahoma. Now headquartered in Seattle, Washington. PC Magazine Editors' Choice for best hosting for 10 consecutive years. Focus on customer-centric hosting with 24/7 US-based support. Offers full range from shared hosting to dedicated servers. Known for transparent pricing and highly customizable VPS options.

pricing.moneyBackExclusions: 3-day money-back guarantee only; Short refund window; Domain fees non-refundable

policiesOverages.bandwidthOveragePolicy: Unlimited within fair use; excessive use may require upgrade
policiesOverages.storageOveragePolicy: Unlimited within fair use; must upgrade for excessive use
policiesOverages.accountSuspensionPolicy: Violation of ToS; non-payment; resource abuse; illegal content
policiesOverages.resourceAbuseDefinition: Excessive CPU usage; spam; illegal activities in US jurisdiction
policiesOverages.hiddenFeesNotes: Transparent pricing with renewal rates visible upfront; Only 3-day money-back (very short); Free domain NOT included; Managed services cost extra; VPS highly customizable but add-ons increase price; No free CDN

contentRestrictions.adultContentNotes: Adult content allowed if legal in US and user is over 18

business.affiliateCommissionAmount: $65 (1-6 sales), $85 (7-12), $100 (13-19), $135 (19+); $25 for unmanaged only; 60-day cookie; $100 minimum payout

editorial.knownIssues: Only 3-day money-back guarantee (extremely short); Low Trustpilot rating (2.9) despite good G2 rating; No free domain included; No staging environment; Limited to 3 data center locations; No CDN included; Renewal prices higher than promo; Some users report billing issues
editorial.bestFor: Developers wanting highly customizable VPS options; Users who value transparent upfront pricing; Adult content websites (rare among hosts); Businesses needing 24/7 US-based phone support; Users wanting both managed and unmanaged options; PC Magazine readers who trust their Editors' Choice
editorial.avoidIf: Need longer money-back guarantee; Require many global server locations; Want included CDN; Need free domain; Prefer all-inclusive pricing; Concerned about mixed Trustpilot reviews; Want staging environments
editorial.competitorComparisonNotes: 99.9999% uptime guarantee (highest in industry); PC Magazine Editors' Choice 10 years; A+ BBB rating (good); Excellent G2 rating (4.8) but poor Trustpilot (2.9); Adult content allowed (rare feature); Transparent pricing (renewal visible upfront); Only 3-day refund (vs 30-45 days competitors); Monthly billing available; Crypto payments accepted

comparisonData.uniqueSellingPoint: 99.9999% uptime guarantee with transparent pricing and adult content hosting allowed
comparisonData.idealCustomerProfile: Developer wanting customizable VPS with transparent pricing and strong uptime guarantee

faqContent.faqIsThisHostGood: Hostwinds is excellent for developers wanting customizable VPS options and has a 99.9999% uptime guarantee. PC Magazine Editors' Choice for 10 years. However, mixed reviews on Trustpilot (2.9) vs excellent G2 rating (4.8).
faqContent.faqWhoOwnsThisHost: Hostwinds is an independently owned, privately held company founded by Peter Holden in 2010. Originally founded in Tulsa, Oklahoma, now headquartered in Seattle, Washington.
faqContent.faqHowMuchDoesItCost: Hostwinds shared hosting starts at $3.29/month (renews at $4.99). Unmanaged VPS starts at $5.17/month. Dedicated servers from $70/month. Monthly billing available.
faqContent.faqIsItBeginnerFriendly: Moderately. Hostwinds offers cPanel, one-click installers, and 24/7 phone support, but the highly customizable nature of their services may overwhelm beginners.
faqContent.faqDoesItIncludeEmail: Yes, unlimited email accounts are included with shared hosting plans, with webmail access and spam filtering.
faqContent.faqCanIHostWordPress: Yes, Hostwinds offers optimized WordPress hosting with automatic installation and updates, though no staging environment is available.
faqContent.faqWhatsTheUptime: Hostwinds guarantees an industry-leading 99.9999% uptime backed by SLA credits for any downtime.
faqContent.faqCanICancelAnytime: Hostwinds offers only a 3-day money-back guarantee, which is much shorter than the industry standard of 30 days. Monthly billing is available, allowing flexible cancellation.
